content: आह्निक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [अह्नि भवः, अह्ना निर्वृत्तः साध्यः ठञ्] {@--1@} Daily, diurnal, performed every day or on a day; आह्निकः स्वाध्यायः daily course of study; °आचारः daily observances. {@--2@} Employed or occurring every day (as a teacher, servant, or fever). --कं {@--1@} Any religious rite or duty which is to be performed every day at a fixed hour; अत्राह्निकं सुरश्रेष्ठो जपते <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--2@} Anything to be performed daily, such as taking meals, bathing &c.; कृताह्निकः संवृत्तः <ls>V. 4</ls>; समुद्रे कृताह्निकः <ls>Mv. 5.</ls> {@--3@} Daily food. {@--4@} Daily work or occupation, what may be read on one day. {@--5@} A division of a work (such as that of the Mahābhāṣya).
